lines.text: [Pvt. Snafu plays his radio loudly in a cramped army barracks]
Pipe down! I'm trying to do some brain work.
How the hell do you expect a guy to study with all that racket going on?
Study? Nuts! When I get at them Nazis, I ain't gonna clunk them over the head with no books. What you'll give them dopes is a belly full of lead!
[Snafuperman's disasterous exploits land him in the hospital]
Too bad. Poor Snafuperman. Is there anything I can do for ya?
Yes... yes there is. I would appreciate it if you would GET ME A FIELD MANUAL!
This looks like a job for Snafuperman!
